linefit.FitAlgorithms

Class LinearFitFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • linefit.FitAlgorithms.LinearFitFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlgorithmFactoryTemplate, PartialDerivativeMinimizationFactory, QuadraticApproximationFactory

    public abstract class LinearFitFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The Abstract class for the Linear Fit Algorithms that allows the user to select the the fit algorithm during fun time
    Since:
    0.98.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Keith Rice

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean canGeneratedFitsFixIntercept
      Whether or not the fit algorithm generated by this factory supports fixing the intercept of the fit.
      protected boolean canGeneratedFitsFixSlope
      Whether or not the fit algorithm generated by this factory supports fixing the slope of the fit.
      static LinearFitFactory[] fitAlgorithmFactories
      The array of all the linear fit factories that will be included in LineFit.

      Creates a new instance of the type of FitAlogritm this is This allows us to generically create the fit algorithm and not have to specify before runtime what kind of linear fit we are using

    • Field Detail

      • fitAlgorithmFactories

        public static final LinearFitFactory[] fitAlgorithmFactories
        The array of all the linear fit factories that will be included in LineFit. In order for a fit algorithm to show up, it must be in this array. The factory at index 0 in this array is the default fit algorithm for LineFit

      • canGeneratedFitsFixSlope

        protected boolean canGeneratedFitsFixSlope
        Whether or not the fit algorithm generated by this factory supports fixing the slope of the fit. Set to false by default

      • canGeneratedFitsFixIntercept

        protected boolean canGeneratedFitsFixIntercept
        Whether or not the fit algorithm generated by this factory supports fixing the intercept of the fit. Set to false by default

    • Constructor Detail

      • LinearFitFactory

        public LinearFitFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • getAlgorithmWithName

        public static LinearFitFactory getAlgorithmWithName(java.lang.String passedName)
        Finds and returns the LinearFtFactory with the given name in the list of algorithm factories in LineFit. if it doesn't find the algorithm with the passed name, it will use the default algorithm position at 0 in the array
        Parameters:
        passedName - The name of the algorithm to get in the list of possible linear fit factories
        Returns:
        Returns the Linear fit factory that has the passed name as its toString method or the default factory if the passed name is not found in the array of fit factories

      • canFixSlopeForGeneratedFits

        public boolean canFixSlopeForGeneratedFits()
        Allows the factory method to determine if the fit algorithms created by it allow you to fix the slope
        Returns:
        Whether or not this fit algorithm allows the user to fix the slope

      • canFixInterceptForGeneratedFits

        public boolean canFixInterceptForGeneratedFits()
        Allows the factory method to determine if the fit algorithms created by it allow you to fix the intercept
        Returns:
        Whether or not this fit algorithm allows the user to fix the intercept

      • createNewLinearFitStartegy

        public abstract LinearFitStrategy createNewLinearFitStartegy(DataSet dataSet)
        Creates a new instance of the type of FitAlogritm this is This allows us to generically create the fit algorithm and not have to specify before runtime what kind of linear fit we are using
        Parameters:
        dataSet - The DataSet that the new FitStrategy will use for data and fit its line to
        Returns:
        Returns a new LinearFitStrategy that is an instance of whatever the instance this is called on subclass Algorithm
